////							 	COPY PROTECTION 									  ////
// Parameters:                                                                              //
//                                                                         					//
// [ID]int 					= The ID of the object.                                   		//
// [NAME (LANG)]string 		= The name of the copy protection in the respective language.   //
// [DATE](MONTH) (YEAR) 	= The date when the copy protection is available.     			//
// [PRICE]int				= How much the copy protection costs.                 			//
// [DEV COSTS]int			= The development costs of the copy protection.       			//
//                                                                                    		//
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
